attributes.action: Want the government to stop messing around with the pension triple lock????
attributes.additional_details: They have to stop messing around with the pensions, and keep to their manifesto promises we are sick and tired of government robbing the poorest in society.
attributes.background: We know they have a difficult job with the economy but why do they always mess about with the pensions, we as pensioners do not seem to have a say in what they do especially when it's in their manifesto, keep the triple lock for pensions.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Keep triple lock on pensions'
https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/625622
